_schema.description: Complete wardrobe item details. This file contains all metadata for every item. Use wardrobe_index.json to filter first, then fetch specific items from this file.

workflow.1_filter: Load wardrobe_index.json and filter by criteria (type, color, season, formality, tags)
workflow.2_fetch: Get item IDs from filtered results
workflow.3_load: Load full details for those specific items from this file
workflow.4_recommend: Use complete metadata to make styling recommendations

benefits.efficiency: Avoid loading 50KB+ of data when you only need to find 'blue shirts for summer'
benefits.scalability: Index stays small (~100-200 bytes/item) even with 500+ items. Only load full details when needed.
benefits.context_management: Keep Claude's context focused on relevant items rather than entire wardrobe
